title: E-Learning
subject: E-Learning is an online Education Next.js Web Template. It's a Template Monster approved Template
description: Intuitive homepage showcasing featured courses, announcements, and upcoming events. Detailed information about the platform's mission, vision, and values. Browse and search through a diverse catalog of available courses. In-depth course descriptions, syllabus, and instructor details. Profiles of skilled instructors, showcasing their expertise and teaching style. Detailed information about individual instructors, including their qualifications and achievements. Frequently Asked Questions section to address common queries.
technologies: Tailwind CSS, React, Next.js, Typescript, Context API, Swiper.js React Countup, Email.js, React Animate Height

title: Coder's Stackbox
subject: Coder's Stackbox is online code editor platform
description: Dashboard Panel, Individual Users, and Admin roles. Create and save front-end Web apps with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript also if you use our IDE then you can import any frontend and framework or libraries like React, and React Router. Blogs write and publish, Projects collections, doc, user support.
technologies: Tailwind CSS, React, Redux, MongoDB, Mongoose, Express.js, JWT, Firebase Auth etc.

title: Coinx
subject: A ThemeForest Approved Template for NFT, cryptocurrency, Web3, and blockchain industries.
description: Staking pool, token management, real-time IDO navigation, secure token swapping. Multi-functional features for buying, selling, and comparing cryptocurrencies. Seamless crypto purchasing with advanced charting, reward systems, and responsive design.
technologies: Next.js, TypeScript, Headlessui, Apexcharts, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, Swiper, SCSS, etc.

title: Boativus
subject: A Wrapbootstrap Approved Template for yacht rental and luxury sea tours.
description: Customizable booking system for managing yacht rentals, marine charters, and luxury sea tours. E-commerce integration for selling yachts, marine accessories, and tour bookings. Dynamic page variety, including multi-layout options for showcasing services, team, and customer interactions.
technologies: React.js, TypeScript, Headlessui, Tailwind CSS, SCSS, Framer Motion, Swiper, Day Picker, React Photo View, etc.

title: CrypGo
subject: A ThemeForest Approved cryptocurrency review and comparison template.
description: Comprehensive comparison system for cryptocurrency exchanges, tokens, and blockchain projects. Market analysis tools, company additions, and address tracking. Interactive design tailored for fintech, blockchain, and crypto advisory platforms.
technologies: Vue.js, Nuxt.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, SCSS, Swiper, GSAP, AOS, etc.
